outcome: The case of the petitioner is that the case pending before the court below has been settled between him and the de facto complainant. The matter involves an offence under Section 304A IPC. This Court
full_text: lee a Bert 2016/KER/71 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2016/14TH POUSHA, 1937 Cri.MC.No. 8074 of 2015 () CC.NO. 444/2013 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT -I, PERINTHALMANNA CRIME NO. 1609/2012 OF PERINTHALMANNA POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT PETITIONER/ACCUSED: JAMALUDHEEN, S/O.VEERAPPU,AGED 26 YEARS, THOTTIPARAMBIL HOSUE, PARAMMAL, PALODE, THACHANATTU KARA, PALAKKAD DISTRICT. BY ADV. SRI.C.M.KAMMAPPU RESPONDENTS/STATE AND DEFACTO COMPLAINANT/INJURED: 1. STATE OF KERALA, REP. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA ERNAKULAM-682 031. (THROUGH STATION HOUSE OFFICER, PERINTHALMANNA POLICE STATION, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT). 2. ABDULLA, S/O. ALIYAMU,AGED 45 YEARS, VAKKAYIL HOUSE, AMMINIKKAD, PERINTHALMANNA TALUK, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-679 126 3. ABDUL HAMEED, S/O MUHAMMED, AMBATTUPARAMBIL HOUSE, THAZHEKKODE AMSOM DESONM, PERINTHALMANNA TALUK, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-679 126 4. NAFEESA, W/O ABDUL HAMEED, AMBATTUPARAMBIL HOUSE, THAZHEKKODE AMSOM DESO\M, PERINTHALMANNA TALUK, MALAPPURAM DISTRICT-679 126 R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT. SAREENA GEORGE R2 TO R4 BY ADV. SRI.LMANSOOR.B.H. THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2016, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: sts Baas 2016/KER/71 Cri.MC.No. 8074 of 2015 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S) ANNEXURES: ANNEX |: TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CRIME NO.1609/2012 OF PERINTHALMANNA POLICE STATION. ANNEX II: TRUE COPY OF THE NOTARIZED AGREEMENT EXECUTED BETWEEN THE FATHER AND MOTHER OF THE DECEASED WITH THE PETITIONER. RESPONDENT(S)' ANNEXURES: NIL ITRUE COPY/ P.A.TO JUDGE sts Bgl soeikERIT B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2016 ORDER The case of the petitioner is that the case pending before the court below has been settled between him and the de facto complainant. The matter involves an offence under Section 304A IPC. This Court cannot entertain any such settlement. It is the further case of the learned counsel for the petitioner that the petitioner is working abroad and, therefore, he could not appear before the court below. Presently, steps are in progress against the sureties. 2. The present request is that the petitioner may be permitted to appear before the court below within a period of two months from today. The court below shall consider the a8 aa Tenet a 2016/KER/71 Crl.M.C.8074/2015 :2: matter sympathetically as far as the sureties are concerned and the court below shall try to abstain from proceeding with coercive steps against the sureties till then. Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/04/01 1 True Copy // PA to Judge
